test_cases.description: IF operation with true test returns then value
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 10
            then: 100
            else: 200

test_cases.description: IF operation with false test returns else value
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 20
            then: 100
            else: 200

test_cases.description: IF with nested operation in test
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: GREATER_THAN
              subject:
                operation: ADD
                values:
                  - 10
                  - 20
              value: 25
            then: "greater"
            else: "not_greater"

test_cases.description: IF with nested operation in then
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 10
            then:
              operation: ADD
              values:
                - 50
                - 25
            else: 0

test_cases.description: IF with nested operation in else
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 20
            then: 0
            else:
              operation: MULTIPLY
              values:
                - 5
                - 10

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: x
            type: number
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 10
                  then: "first"
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 20
                  then: "second"
              default: "none"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: x
            type: number
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 10
                  then: "first"
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 20
                  then: "second"
              default: "none"

test_cases.description: SWITCH operation - no case matches, returns default
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: x
            type: number
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 10
                  then: "first"
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 20
                  then: "second"
              default: "none"

test_cases.description: SWITCH with nested operation in then value
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      definitions:
        BASE: 100
      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: x
            type: number
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 1
                  then:
                    operation: MULTIPLY
                    values:
                      - $BASE
                      - 2
              default: $BASE

test_cases.description: SWITCH with boolean variable in when clause
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: is_eligible
            type: boolean
          - name: is_fallback
            type: boolean
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when: $is_eligible
                  then: "eligible"
                - when: $is_fallback
                  then: "fallback"
              default: "none"
